flavorText:
"If you're as loyal as you claim, now is the time to show it."
—Queen Linden of Ardenvale

foreignData.flavorText:
„Jetzt könnt ihr beweisen, ob ihr wirklich so loyal seid, wie ihr behauptet."
—Königin Linden von Ardenthal
foreignData.name: Für die Krone
foreignData.text:
Erzeuge zwei 1/1 weiße Mensch-Kreaturenspielsteine.
Adamant — Falls drei oder mehr weiße Mana ausgegeben wurden, um diesen Zauberspruch zu wirken, erhältst du für jede Kreatur, die du kontrollierst, 1 Lebenspunkt dazu.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Si eres tan leal como aseguras, llegó la hora de demostrarlo".
—Reina Linden del Valle de Arden
foreignData.name: Aliarse por el trono
foreignData.text:
Crea dos fichas de criatura Humano blancas 1/1.
Tesón — Si se usaron al menos tres manás blancos para lanzar este hechizo, ganas 1 vida por cada criatura que controlas.

foreignData.flavorText:
« Si votre loyauté est aussi indéfectible que vous l'affirmez, c'est le moment de le prouver. »
—Reine Linden d'Ardenval
foreignData.name: Ralliement pour le trône
foreignData.text:
Créez deux jetons de créature 1/1 blanche Humain.
Inflexible — Si au moins trois manas blancs ont été dépensés pour lancer ce sort, vous gagnez 1 point de vie pour chaque créature que vous contrôlez.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Se siete davvero leali come sostenete, ora è il momento di dimostrarlo."
—Regina Linden di Ardenvalle
foreignData.name: Adunata per il Trono
foreignData.text:
Crea due pedine creatura Umano 1/1 bianche.
Adamantino — Se sono stati spesi almeno tre mana bianchi per lanciare questa magia, guadagni 1 punto vita per ogni creatura che controlli.

foreignData.flavorText:
「あなたがたに口で言う通りの忠誠心があるのなら、今こそそれを示す時です。」
――アーデンベイルのリンデン女王
foreignData.name: 王権のための結集
foreignData.text:
白の１/１の人間・クリーチャー・トークンを２体生成する。
一徹 ― この呪文を唱えるために白マナが３点以上支払われていたなら、あなたはあなたがコントロールしているクリーチャー１体につき１点のライフを得る。

foreignData.flavorText:
"네 충성심이 진정으로 네 주장과 같다면, 지금이 그것을 증명할 때이다."
—아르덴베일의 린덴 여왕
foreignData.name: 왕좌를 위한 결집
foreignData.text:
1/1 백색 인간 생물 토큰 두 개를 만든다.
단호 — 이 주문을 발동하는 데 적어도 백색 마나 세 개가 지불되었다면, 당신은 당신이 조종하는 생물 한 개당 생명 1점을 얻는다.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Se você é leal como diz ser, agora é a hora de mostrar."
— Rainha Linden do Vale Arden
foreignData.name: Reunir pelo Trono
foreignData.text:
Crie duas fichas de criatura branca 1/1 do tipo Humano.
Obstinação — Se ao menos três manas brancos tiverem sido gastos para conjurar esta mágica, você ganha 1 ponto de vida para cada criatura que você controla.

foreignData.flavorText:
«Если вы действительно так верны, как говорите, то пришло время это показать».
— королева Линден из Арденвейла
foreignData.name: Сплотиться во Имя Трона
foreignData.text:
Создайте две фишки существа 1/1 белый Человек.
Твердость — Если на разыгрывание этого заклинания было потрачено три или больше белой маны, то вы получаете 1 жизнь за каждое существо под вашим контролем.

foreignData.flavorText:
「如果各位自认忠心耿耿，现在便是展现时机。」
～雅登瓦的琳登女王
foreignData.name: 保皇动员
foreignData.text:
派出两个1/1白色人类衍生生物。
固色～如果施放此咒语时支付过至少三点白色法术力，则你每操控一个生物，便获得1点生命。

foreignData.flavorText:
「如果各位自認忠心耿耿，現在便是展現時機。」
～雅登瓦的琳登女王
foreignData.name: 保皇動員
foreignData.text:
派出兩個1/1白色人類衍生生物。
固色～如果施放此咒語時支付過至少三點白色魔法力，則你每操控一個生物，便獲得1點生命。

name: Rally for the Throne
originalText:
Create two 1/1 white Human creature tokens.
Adamant — If at least three white mana was spent to cast this spell, you gain 1 life for each creature you control.

rulings.text: You create Humans and gain life all while Rally for the Throne is resolving. Nothing can happen between the two, and no player may choose to take actions.

If an instant or sorcery spell has an adamant ability, you perform the spell's instructions in order. You don't perform the adamant instruction before the spell resolves or before any other effects printed above it.

If an effect allows you to cast a spell without paying its mana cost, you can't choose to cast it and pay unless another rule or effect allows you to cast that spell for a cost. Similarly, you can't waive a cost reduction unless that effect says you may.

Adamant effects check what mana was actually spent to cast a spell. If an effect allows you to spend mana “as though it were mana” of any color or type, that allows you to spend mana you couldn't otherwise spend, but it doesn't change what mana you spent to cast the spell.
If you copy a spell that has an adamant ability, no mana was spent to cast the copy at all, so that ability won't apply.

text:
Create two 1/1 white Human creature tokens.
Adamant — If at least three white mana was spent to cast this spell, you gain 1 life for each creature you control.
